title: Two-Day Symposium with RMLNLU & High Commission of Canada
description: A landmark event that brought legal experts, government leaders, and community voices together.
highlights: Chief Guest: Shri Asim Arun, Minister of Social Welfare
Distinguished guests: RMLNLU VC Prof. (Dr.) Amar Pal Singh, Filmmaker Onir, Rights activist Mx. Dhananjay Chauhan, Mr. Iqbal Kidwai
impact: Widely appreciated for its inclusivity and depth, setting new benchmarks for LGBTQIA+ awareness in UP.

title: CME for Medical Professionals – KGMU, High Commission of Canada & IPS
description: A breakthrough Continuing Medical Education program commemorating IDAHOBIT.
achievements: Sessions by nationally renowned psychiatrists, endocrinologists, and medical faculty
impact: Strengthened medical cultural competency and initiated an ongoing conversation on queer healthcare.

title: Media Sensitization: Samvedna – #ReportWithPride
description: A workshop for mass communication students and journalists.
impact: Built a generation of sensitive and informed storytellers.

description: A pioneering festival celebrating transgender literature and culture, promoting inclusivity, creativity, and community engagement in Uttar Pradesh.
title: India’s First Transgender Literature & Cultural Festival – UP Govt
purpose: To celebrate transgender voices, literature, poetry, and art.
impact: Created a safe cultural space for transgender writers, poets, performers, and activists — encouraging expression, visibility, and pride.

title: Queer Eve – Night of a Thousand Rainbows
description: A colourful cultural celebration collaborated with the High Commission of Canada.
impact: A platform for emerging LGBTQIA+ artists and performers to shine.

title: First Queer Sports Day in Lucknow
description: Celebrating Pride Month with energy, joy, and community bonding.
impact: Enhanced physical and emotional well-being through sports.

title: Monthly Sensitization Training for UP Police
impact: Created a more empathetic and aware police force.

title: Government Department Training – SIRDUP & Social Welfare Department
impact: Government staff are now equipped to offer inclusive public services.

title: First LGBTQIA+ Support Cell in UP – Amity University
impact: A safe space for psycho-social support, career counselling, and mental health screening.

title: Partnership with SRMU for Inclusive Campus Programming
impact: Encouraging an open and progressive learning environment.

title: NTPC NRHQ – Mental Health at Workplace
workshop: It’s Time to Prioritize Mental Health in the Workplace.

title: Reliance Industries Limited – Workplace Well-being
workshop: It’s Time to Prioritize Mental Health in the Workplace.
impact: Helping organisations build emotionally supportive workspaces.

title: Man-Mridang (1, 2 & 3)
description: A signature self-expression & mental health series.

title: Jashn-e-Naari (Women’s Day Special)
purpose: A healing space for cis and trans women.

title: Hope Beyond Hurt
description: A trauma-healing and emotional resilience initiative.
impact: Supporting survivors in rebuilding hope and reclaiming strength.

title: LGBTQIA+ Mental Health Helpline
description: A dedicated support line for emotional, psychological, or crisis support.
